item.title: Bio Bin Experiment
item.description: Given that wild baby Panther Chameleons are often found in low brush or tall grass, we would like to simulate that as much as possible. So in 2019, we are experimenting with raising our babies in bio bins for the first month of life. We have multiple soil layers (drainage, abg & leaf) and 3 - 4 species of inspects in every bin.
